alumniOf.name:
NY. He served in the U.S. Air Force from 2000-2007. He is a veteran of Operation Enduring Freedom and received the Joint Service Achievement Medal for his work as a Spanish linguist for the Defense Intelligence Agency in 2005. William graduated from Campbell University in 2007 with a degree in computer science. He earned his J.D. in 2011 from the North Carolina Central University School of Law. His practice areas include immigration law and criminal defense cases. He is licensed and in good standing with the State Bar of North Carolina and a member of the American Immigration Lawyer Association (AILA.) He is a proud member of the Charlotte community and provides compassionate counsel for all his clients.

itemListElement.name: Winston salem nc auto accident lawyers

content.heroSection:
Winston-Salem, NC Auto Accident Lawyers

Injured in an auto accident you weren’t at fault for? If this is your experience, you know how crushing it can be when you are hurt in an accident through no fault of your own, yet you are left to deal with the broken pieces: recovering from injuries, missing out on work, communicating with insurance companies, and making payments that are often outside of your means. 

What you need to know is that you are not alone. If you are dealing with the fallout after an auto accident, there are many other people who have gone through your same experience, and our Winston-Salem auto accident lawyers have helped them successfully recover millions of dollars in verdicts and settlements! 

At Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we want you to know that there is someone on your side to handle the legal intricacies of seeking auto accident compensation while you focus on recovering. Reach out to us to schedule a free initial consultation and learn how we can be the advocate you need in this dark time. 

Cases We Handle

Our skilled Winston-Salem auto accident lawyers have over 35 years of combined legal experience standing up for victims with even the most challenging cases. We’ve helped hundreds of clients who have been injured in a variety of situations, so we are knowledgeable in handling a variety of accident types, including: 

  • Truck accidents (including semis, tractor trailers, and other commercial vehicles)
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Drunk driving accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Accidents caused by uninsured drivers
  • Accidents involving emergency vehicles
  • Accidents involving public or mass transportation 
  • And others!

Regardless of the circumstances surrounding your accident, if another party was at fault, we are prepared to aggressively pursue the amount your case is worth! 

Practice Areas

  • Winston-Salem, NC Auto Accident Lawyers
  • Winston-Salem, NC Immigration Lawyers
  • Winston-Salem, NC Workers’ Comp Lawyers

contentSections.template: [Attorney name] brings extensive legal experience to every case. Licensed to practice in [jurisdictions], [he/she] has successfully represented hundreds of clients in [practice areas].
